MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 and CH8 postcode areas of Bagillt and Holywell, affecting a number of properties in the local area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of access difficulties on site and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:41PM on 24th November 2020.
